de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.projected

Class ProjectedIndex<O,I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.projected.ProjectedIndex<O,I>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - Outer object type.
    I - Inner object type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Index, KNNIndex<O>, RangeIndex<O>, RKNNIndex<O>, Result
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LatLngAsECEFIndex, LngLatAsECEFIndex

    public class ProjectedIndex<O,I>
extends Object
implements KNNIndex<O>, RKNNIndex<O>, RangeIndex<O>
    Class to index data in an arbitrary projection only. Note: be careful when using this class, as it may/will yield incorrect distances, depending on your projection! It may be desirable to use a modified index that corrects for this error, or supports specific combiantions only. See LatLngAsECEFIndex and LngLatAsECEFIndex for example indexes that support only a specific (good) combination. FIXME: add refinement to bulk queries!
